entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
